title: Trump's economic speech veers off-topic as he takes aim at Biden and Powell
description: The speech at the Detroit Economic Club comes after major foreign policy moves have overshadowed domestic policy.
content: The speech at the Detroit Economic Club comes after major foreign policy moves have overshadowed domestic policy.
